title: Surrender
description: A Hot Romance in Nine Installments...Welcome to the Plume – where members are bound by desire and fantasies come true…When Mike learns that the delicious Joanna intends to surrender to Master Rex at the Plume to be educated as a sex slave, he knows he has to protect the woman he loves. He'll do whatever is necessary to get back inside the club he vowed to leave forever. But Master Rex and his partner Athena have surprises in store for both Mike and Joanna, including one that will change their lives forever.
author: Ella Ardent
